about_the_game:
Enjoy the atmosphere of the Mooseman soundtrack and learn the thought behind the game's artwork.

OST is wirtten by Mikhail Shvachko.

The choral music is performed by Student Сhoir of Perm Krai College of Arts and Culture.
Choral music is arranged and conducted by Larisa Beletskaya.

The track list of the Moosman OST:

  • Yen Dzodzogez (Title Theme)
  • Explore
  • The Chase
  • Explore II
  • The Cave of Kudym-Osh
  • Eyes of Cheran
  • The Hunt
  • Stars of the Lower World
  • Forest of Bones
  • Cheran
  • Crystals in the Dark
  • Vakul
  • Sacrifice to Vorsa
  • The Dawn
  • Kudym-Kar
  • Healer
  • Manpupuner
  • Yen Dzodzogges
  • Asya Kia
detailed_description:
Enjoy the atmosphere of the Mooseman soundtrack and learn the thought behind the game's artwork.

OST is wirtten by Mikhail Shvachko.

The choral music is performed by Student Сhoir of Perm Krai College of Arts and Culture.
Choral music is arranged and conducted by Larisa Beletskaya.
